City Council
============

![City Council](https://www.ci.garden-ridge.tx.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=5895)

The City Council enacts policies, adopts ordinances and resolutions, establishes the annual budget to provide services to the public, and sets the city tax rate and water rates for Garden Ridge.

Meetings
--------

Meetings are held on the first Wednesday of each month at 6pm in City Hall, 9400 Municipal Parkway.

Agendas and Minutes
-------------------

[Agendas](https://www.ci.garden-ridge.tx.us/111/Agendas-Minutes) are available prior to the meetings, and [Minutes](https://www.ci.garden-ridge.tx.us/111/Agendas-Minutes) are available following their approval.

City Council Rules of Conduct
-----------------------------

View the [Rules of Participation](https://www.ci.garden-ridge.tx.us/DocumentCenter/View/4641/Citizen-Comment-Period) for speaking at a City Council Meeting.

Members
-------

Get to know the Mayor and City Councilmembers by **clicking on their photo below**.
